Anaplastic Astrocytomas    Treatment of anaplastic astrocytomas may include the following:            -  Surgery and radiation therapy. Chemotherapy may also be given.     - Surgery and chemotherapy.     - A clinical trial of chemotherapy placed into the brain during surgery.     - A clinical trial of a new treatment added to standard treatment.
